3: What is it? Has anything gotten through?
Nothing out of the ordinary, sir.
Luckily, my surveillance system is still functional.
Ha! I wouldn't have thrown you out if it didn't work, you know?
Didn't those humans throw us out for that exact reason...?
Ha! Probably have internalized that rationale is what it is. Gotta make myself useful somehow.
We're nothing like them. We never abandon one of our own.
So far, the only human I've met that feels this way...

2: There will be more. It has to be.

3: Seeing that you're here without a platoon behind you, I'll trust you this one time.
Hmph. That said, it wouldn't be the first time I trust you, would it?

4: Gray Raven is very reliable, you know.

3: Sure, sure... Come on, let's go to the next location.
